saying: Sometimes you have to lose to win.
description: Diana is a snooty deer villager in the Animal Crossing series. She first appeared in Animal Crossing: New Leaf. Her English name refers to the mythical Diana, the Goddess of the Hunt, who transformed a huntsman into a deer when he glimpsed her bathing in the woods; in reference to this, her home is themed after a bathhouse. Her catchphrase "no doy" is a term used to label something as common knowledge in an informal conversation, relating to her snooty personality. "Doy" also sounds similar to "doe", a name for a female deer.
